head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAKER, VALERIE D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAKER, VALERIE D.

block.p: BAKER-Valerie D. Of New York City and Sea Cliff, NY, February 27, 1998. Beloved daughter of Enid; loving brother of Charles E. Baker. Visiting 3-5 and 7-9 PM, Wednesday, Whitting Funeral Home, Glen Head, NY. Funeral service 8:30 PM, Wednesday, at funeral home. Interment private. Contributions to American Cancer Society.
